metadata.title: CVE-2018-6520 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 allows remote attackers to bypass an openredirect protection mechanism via crafted authority data in a URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
